abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Banish kills a special monster on the screen, though it offers no reward.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: Killing enemies this turn gives health equal to their attacks.

abilities.name: Big Game Hunter
abilities.description: This skill will convert a random skull anywhere on the board to a random special skull.

abilities.name: Boost Armour
abilities.description: Doubles all armor collected for a single turn.

abilities.name: Boost Damage
abilities.description: Doubles all sword damage for a single turn.

abilities.name: Boost Gold
abilities.description: Doubles all gold collected for a single turn.

abilities.name: Boost Health
abilities.description: Double all potions collected for a single turn.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Collect all tiles around the edge of board.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.description: All enemies will attack themselves the next turn.

abilities.name: Dazzle
abilities.description: Converts all coins to swords.

abilities.name: Disarm
abilities.description: Converts all skulls to swords.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.description: Randomly rearranges all tiles on the board.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description: Allows the player to instantly upgrade an item.

abilities.name: Exorcise
abilities.description: Converts a random special skull to a normal skull.

abilities.name: Explosive Armour
abilities.description: Damages every skull on the board equal to how many armour points you currently have.

abilities.name: Explosive Potion
abilities.description: Turns all potions on the screen into exploding potions. Matched explosive potions destroy nearby tiles.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Collect a random 3x3 block of tiles.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: Freezes enemies so they are unable to attack for one turn.

abilities.name: Golden Touch
abilities.description: Converts all swords to coins.

abilities.name: Greed
abilities.description: Kills any skulls that are next to a coin. Does not work on special skulls.

abilities.name: Hack
abilities.description: Replaces a random row with swords.

abilities.name: Haste
abilities.description: Creates a chain tile, which allows you to match two different tile types.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Collect all healing potions.

abilities.name: Last Stand
abilities.description: Refill health completely if you are killed this turn.

abilities.name: Magic Sword
abilities.description: Converts one random sword into a magic sword tile, which does 5 times the damage of a regular sword.

abilities.name: Mana Potion
abilities.description: Turns all potions on the screen into mana potions. Matched mana potions reduce ability cooldowns.

abilities.name: Masochism
abilities.description: Converts all coins to skulls. This ability can create special skulls as well.

abilities.name: Repair
abilities.description: Collect all shields.

abilities.name: Rune
abilities.description: If you trace a closed path this turn, collect all tiles inside it.

abilities.name: Scavenge
abilities.description: Convert all swords to shields.

abilities.name: Shatter
abilities.description: Destroy all enemies' defense.

abilities.name: Skill Elixir
abilities.description: Collect all healing potions as XP.

abilities.name: Slash
abilities.description: Collect a random row of tiles.

abilities.name: Steal
abilities.description: Attacking enemies gives gold for a single turn.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Replaces the current board with all new tiles with no skulls.

abilities.name: Trap
abilities.description: All new monsters added to the board that turn are created with 1 HP.

abilities.name: Treasure
abilities.description: Collect all coins.

abilities.name: Treasure Chamber
abilities.description: All new tiles added to the board that turn are coins. Does not stack with teleport or hack & slash.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.description: Converts all swords to arrows. Arrows can match enemies 1 tile away.

abilities.name: Wish
abilities.description: Collects all tiles on the board. This is a single use skill.
